ComicInfo.Summary: Gods... who needs them? The Gods of Godworld were displaced on Earth long ago. They have lived among us for years, without our knowledge. Luckily they've lived under a strict rule of non-interference with the human race. But what happens when we start to interfere with them? The crap hits the fan and the only one who can clean up this mess? Savage Dragon.
ComicInfo.Tags: Zeek,Hercules,Mace,White House,Race,Forever Serpent,Striker,Special Operations Strikeforce,Powerhouse,The Pentagon,Savage Dragon
